activities:
Personal data regarding current and former employees, contractors, and job applicants of Scientific Games Corporation or any of its subsidiaries, and their respective beneficiaries and dependents, located in any country in the European Economic Area. This certification covers Scientific Games Corporation and its U.S. subsidiaries.
